#summary Physical and virtual memory map

== Physical memory ==

||  *start*   ||    *end*   ||   *size*   ||                                        ||
|| 0x00000000 || 0x00100000 || 0x00100000 || BIOS                                   ||
|| 0x00100000 || 0x00101000 || 0x00001000 || Loader (kldr.exe)                      ||
|| 0x00102000 || 0x00108000 || 0x00006000 || Kernel (kernel.exe)                    ||
|| 0x00108000 || 0x00118000 || 0X00010000 || Kernel stack                           ||
|| 0x00118000 || 0x00119000 || 0x00001000 || Frame manager bitset (1 frame / 128 MiB of available memory)  ||
|| 0x00119000 || 0x0011A000 || 0x00001000 || Kernel page directory                  ||
|| 0x0011A000 || 0x0011B000 || 0x00001000 || Kernel page table 0 (identity)         ||
|| 0x0011B000 || 0x0011C000 || 0x00001000 || Kernel page table 756 (3GiB kernel)    ||
||    ....    ||    ....    ||    ....    || Available                              ||

== Kernel virtual memory ==

||  *start*   ||    *end*   ||   *size*   ||                                        ||
|| 0x00000000 || 0x00100000 || 0x00100000 || BIOS                                   ||
|| 0x00100000 || 0x00101000 || 0x00001000 || Loader (kldr.exe)                      ||
||    ....    ||    ....    ||    ....    || Available                              ||
|| 0xC0000000 || 0xC0006000 || 0x00006000 || Kernel (kernel.exe)                    ||
|| 0xC0006000 || 0xC0007000 || 0X00001000 || Kernel stack page guard                ||
|| 0xC0007000 || 0xC0017000 || 0X00010000 || Kernel stack                           ||
|| 0xC0017000 || 0xC0018000 || 0x00001000 || Frame manager bitset                   ||
||    ....    ||    ....    ||    ....    || Available                              ||
|| 0xFFC00000 || 0xFFFFFFFF || 0x00400000 || Kernel page directory                  ||
